thread.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo star Mama June drops to a UK size eight from 33 stone to ‘get revenge’ on ex-husband Sugar Bear and his new bride
thread.title_full: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo star Mama June drops to a UK size eight from 33 stone to ‘get revenge’ on ex-husband Sugar Bear and his new bride

author: lfranklin
title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo star Mama June drops to a UK size eight from 33 stone to ‘get revenge’ on ex-husband Sugar Bear and his new bride
text:
TV Magazine SWEET (SUGAR FREE) REVENGE Here Comes Honey Boo Boo star Mama June drops to a UK size eight from 33 stone to ‘get revenge’ on ex-husband Sugar Bear and his new bride 
The formerly obese reality star pledges to slim down after Sugar invites him to his wedding By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 25th February 2017, 12:49 am
